Sentencas: Ceria-samaria (CeO2-Sm2O3) is one of the most interesting fluorite oxides since its ionic conductivity is higher than that of yttria-stabilized zirconia in air.
Titulo: Preparation of an alkali-element or alkali-earth-element-doped CeO2-Sm2O3 system and its operation properties as the electrolyte in planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, these CeO2-based oxides are partially reduced and develop electronic conductivity under fuel cell operating conditions.
Titulo: Preparation of an alkali-element or alkali-earth-element-doped CeO2-Sm2O3 system and its operation properties as the electrolyte in planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In their application to the SOFC system, their current densities and power densities are not a a satisfactory level.
Titulo: Preparation of an alkali-element or alkali-earth-element-doped CeO2-Sm2O3 system and its operation properties as the electrolyte in planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: For the development of high-performance CeO2 electrolytes, it is important that the fluorite lattice of CeO2-based oxide be improved from the viewpoint of crystallography.
Titulo: Preparation of an alkali-element or alkali-earth-element-doped CeO2-Sm2O3 system and its operation properties as the electrolyte in planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this study, it is assumed that the reduction of Ce4+ in the fluorite lattice was inhibited by expansion of the CeO2 lattice.
Titulo: Preparation of an alkali-element or alkali-earth-element-doped CeO2-Sm2O3 system and its operation properties as the electrolyte in planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In order to investigate the contribution of the expanded CeO2 lattice to reduction resistance, CeO2-Sm2O3 solid solution, calcia-doped CeO2-Sm2O3 solid solution, and a small amount of alkali element-doped CeO2-Sm2O3-based oxide were prepared for comparison.
Titulo: Preparation of an alkali-element or alkali-earth-element-doped CeO2-Sm2O3 system and its operation properties as the electrolyte in planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was found that the calcia or a small amount of alkali element-doped CeO2 solid solution enhanced the oxide ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Preparation of an alkali-element or alkali-earth-element-doped CeO2-Sm2O3 system and its operation properties as the electrolyte in planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The power density of the latter showed a high value at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Preparation of an alkali-element or alkali-earth-element-doped CeO2-Sm2O3 system and its operation properties as the electrolyte in planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is concluded that the improved fuel cell performance can be attributed to the good reduction resistance in the fuel cell atmosphere.
Titulo: Preparation of an alkali-element or alkali-earth-element-doped CeO2-Sm2O3 system and its operation properties as the electrolyte in planar solid oxide fuel cells
